Package org.tictactoeclass

Class StateManager.GameState

java.lang.Object
org.tictactoeclass.StateManager.GameState
Enclosing class:
StateManager
public class StateManager.GameState extends Object
The GameState class represents the objects of a tic-tac-toe game that need to be saved .

  • Constructor Details

    • GameState

      public GameState(Player player1, Player player2, Board board, int turnCount)
      Constructor that initializes the state of the game.
      Parameters:
      player1 - The first player in the game.
      player2 - The second player in the game.
      board - The board on which the game is played.
      turnCount - The number of turns that have been taken in the game to know which player should play.
